pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, July 29, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, July 29, 2017:

Winnipeg, Manitoba

7:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Manitoba, Brian Pallister.

Cambridge Room
Fairmont Winnipeg
2 Lombard Place

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:15 a.m.

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and will hold media availability.

Future site of Canada's Diversity Gardens
Corner of Conservatory Drive and Locomotive Drive
Assiniboine Park

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.

Revelstoke, British Columbia

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Canadian Red Cross Fundraiser for those affected by the BC wildfires and will deliver remarks.

Grizzly Plaza
111 MacKenzie Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:15 p.m.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the CP Canada 150 Train event in Revelstoke and will board the train to Calgary.

Revelstoke Yard
420 Victoria Road

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.
